dishes.description: Crispy chicken pieces in a tangy sweet and sour sauce.

dishes.description: Tender beef and fresh broccoli in a savory brown sauce.

dishes.description: Delicious crispy spring rolls filled with fresh vegetables.

dishes.name: Shrimp Fried Rice
dishes.description: Flavorful fried rice with succulent shrimp and vegetables.

dishes.name: Peking Duck
dishes.description: Roasted duck with thin pancakes, hoisin sauce, and sliced scallions.

dishes.name: Mango Sticky Rice
dishes.description: Sweet sticky rice topped with ripe mango slices.

dishes.description: Creamy green tea-flavored ice cream.

dishes.description: Stir-fried noodles with a variety of vegetables and protein.

dishes.description: Tender chicken coated in a sweet and savory sesame sauce.

dishes.description: Crispy battered fish served with fries and tartar sauce.
